meanings.definition: A suffix used to form the plural of certain nouns.
meanings.sent1: I saw two ois in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The ois were jumping around happily.
meanings.sent3: The ois decided to have a party in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with ois, creating a colorful scene.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained that ois make words plural.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form the past tense of certain verbs.
meanings.sent1: She added ois to the end of the word.
meanings.sent2: The ois indicated actions that already happened.
meanings.sent3: The cat ois-ed its way through the obstacle course.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to ois as the day went by.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller used ois to describe events from the past.
